name: todoist-manager
description: Manage Todoist projects and tasks via the Todoist API. List/create projects, list/create/update/complete/delete tasks. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: todoist_manager
toolDefinition.description: Manage Todoist projects and tasks: list/get/create projects, list/get/create/update/complete/delete tasks. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for Todoist API access.

action.description: list_projects (all projects), get_project (project details), create_project (new project), list_tasks (tasks with optional filters), get_task (task details), create_task (new task), update_task (modify task), complete_task (mark done), delete_task (remove task)

projectId.description: Project ID. Required for get_project. Optional for list_tasks and create_task.

taskId.description: Task ID. Required for get_task, update_task, complete_task, delete_task.

isFavorite.description: Whether the project is a favorite (optional for create_project).

content.description: Task content/title (required for create_task, optional for update_task).

priority.description: Task priority 1-4 where 4 is urgent (optional for create_task, update_task).

dueString.description: Natural language due date e.g. 'tomorrow', 'next Monday' (optional for create_task, update_task).

labels.description: Labels to apply to a task (optional for create_task, update_task).

label.description: Filter tasks by label name for list_tasks (optional).
